decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of aggressive creatures like Ragavan and Phelia, along with disruptive elements such as Solitude and Teferi, to control the board while constantly applying pressure to the opponent. Consign to Memory and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker add card advantage, while Quantum Riddler offers additional utility. The deck also includes removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Prismatic Ending to deal with opposing threats. The mana base supports the deck's color requirements, allowing for consistent casting of spells. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while presenting a fast clock to secure victory.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with Birthing Ritual and utilizing creatures with enter the battlefield effects to control the board and apply pressure to the opponent. By playing efficient creatures like Coiling Oracle and Shardless Agent, along with disruptive cards like Subtlety and Force of Negation, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent early in the game. The inclusion of Snow-Covered lands and Ice-Fang Coatl also provides additional versatility and synergies within the deck. Overall, the strategy revolves around tempo plays and maintaining board advantage to secure a quick victory.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying low-cost artifact creatures and using various mana acceleration tools to power them up. The key strategy involves using cards like Mox Opal and Springleaf Drum to rapidly build a wide board presence, while also utilizing cards such as Arcbound Ravager and Engineered Explosives to control the opponent's board state. Urza's Saga serves as a versatile tool for fetching key artifacts, while Pithing Needle can shut down troublesome opposing cards. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of speed and synergy within its artifact-based creature lineup.

This deck focuses on fast and aggressive gameplay while disrupting the opponent's strategies with taxing effects. It utilizes powerful creatures like Ragavan and Elesh Norn to apply pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Solitude and Lightning Bolt for removal and disruption. Teferi, Time Raveler is used to control the tempo of the game, while Consign to Memory provides card advantage. The land base is carefully constructed to ensure the deck can consistently hit its mana requirements. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with efficient threats and disruption.

The deck focuses on utilizing cheap artifacts and creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggression. By utilizing cards like Mox Opal and Mishra's Bauble, the deck aims to quickly play multiple threats on the board while also having access to powerful disruption tools like Engineered Explosives and Metallic Rebuke. Urza's Saga is a key card in this strategy, allowing the deck to tutor for important artifacts while also generating strong tokens. Overall, the deck aims to establish a fast and powerful board presence while disrupting the opponent's game plan.

The deck focuses on using Indomitable Creativity to cheat out powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker. The combination of Galvanic Discharge and Leyline Binding allows for control over the opponent's board, while Teferi, Time Raveler provides additional disruption. The deck also includes a variety of counterspells and removal spells to protect the combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The mana base allows for consistent access to all colors needed for the deck's spells and abilities.

The deck focuses on controlling the opponent's plays through counterspells, hand disruption, and removal spells. It aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy and maintain board control by constantly removing threats and countering key spells. The deck also includes cards that provide card advantage and allow for card selection to ensure that the player has the necessary answers at all times. Overall, the goal is to outlast the opponent and win through attrition by keeping the board clear and overwhelming the opponent with efficient spells.

This deck focuses on disrupting your opponent's game plan while putting pressure on them with aggressive creatures. It aims to control the board with removal spells like Path to Exile and Prismatic Ending, while also utilizing cards like Thoughtseize and Teferi, Time Raveler to disrupt their hand and spells. The creatures in the deck provide additional disruption with abilities like flickering and enchanting, allowing for tempo swings in your favor. The mana base is built to support a variety of colors to cast your spells efficiently.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly to play powerful lands and combo pieces to overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Amulet of Vigor and Primeval Titan, the deck can quickly assemble a win condition through lands such as Urza's Saga and Lotus Field. The key strategy is to accelerate mana production, search for key combo pieces, and use powerful lands to create overwhelming board states to secure victory in a Modern 1 vs 1 format.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on early aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, backed up by burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah. To disrupt opponents, cards like Blood Moon and Static Prison are included, while cards like Arena of Glory help maintain pressure on the opponent. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive strategy with a mix of fetch lands and basic lands.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and efficient creatures, supported by artifact cards that provide additional value and disruption. By utilizing cards like Memnite and Pinnacle Emissary alongside powerful artifacts like Mox Opal and Mishra's Bauble, the deck aims to establish a strong board presence quickly and put pressure on the opponent. Engineered Explosives and Metallic Rebuke provide control elements, while Urza's Saga helps to tutor for key artifacts. Overall, the deck focuses on aggressive play and leveraging the synergy between creatures and artifacts to achieve victory.

This deck focuses on generating large amounts of mana quickly and efficiently, using cards like Ruby Medallion and rituals to power out spells. The key strategy is to chain together spells to eventually cast Grapeshot or Past in Flames for a game-winning combo. Ral, Monsoon Mage can help filter through the deck and find the necessary pieces, while cards like Wish provide additional flexibility. The deck also includes some card draw and recursion to maintain consistency and resilience. Overall, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a storm of powerful spells.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana and overwhelm the opponent with a mix of creatures and disruptive spells. By using cards like Coiling Oracle and Shardless Agent to draw cards and put more resources on the battlefield, along with Birthing Ritual to generate extra mana, the deck aims to outpace the opponent and establish board control. The inclusion of various disruptive creatures like Endurance and Subtlety, as well as counter spells like Force of Negation, helps to protect the player's board and disrupt the opponent's strategy.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Simic Birthing Ritual to quickly ramp into powerful creatures and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Coiling Oracle, Shardless Agent, and Ice-Fang Coatl provide card advantage and board presence, while Abhorrent Oculus and Harbinger of the Seas pressure the opponent. Subtlety and Flare of Denial offer counterspells to protect your board, and Sink into Stupor disrupts the opponent's hand. The deck aims to close out the game quickly with its aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, while also having some control elements to handle threats from the opponent.

The main focus of this deck is to play aggressively and quickly, utilizing low-cost creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler, Monastery Swiftspear, and Slickshot Show-Off to deal damage efficiently. By including cards like Mishra's Bauble, Lava Dart, and Lightning Bolt, the deck aims to control the board while maintaining pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes spells like Mutagenic Growth and Violent Urge to pump up creatures and deal additional damage. With a mix of cheap spells and efficient creatures, this UR Aggro deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure quick victories.

This deck focuses on utilizing low-cost, aggressive creatures and spells to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The key strategy is to maintain a fast pace and apply pressure on the opponent with cards like Dragon's Rage Channeler, Monastery Swiftspear, and Slickshot Show-Off. Mishra's Bauble provides card advantage while Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart offer direct damage to control the board. The deck also includes pump spells like Mutagenic Growth and Violent Urge to enhance creature attacks. Expressive Iteration and Preordain help with card selection and mana acceleration. The mana base consists of fetch lands and dual lands for consistent color access.
